input.sentences: the cemetery where the burial took place .
the new grave site of a person recently buried .
a group of mourners talk outside after the service .
a bit of refreshment for the mourners after the dedication .
the cleric who preformed the service .
output.sentences: The cemetery is where people go for burial.
This site was just dug up for a recently dead person.
After the service, mourners gathered to talk.
The mourners had a few refreshments and a small dedication.
The service was performed by a cleric and part time Sally Jesse drag queen.
